content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. What's your name?
Hi, I'm participant_2. It's nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you too. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play racquetball, try new barbeque restaurants, and listen to oldies music.
That sounds like fun. I like to play racquetball too. I also love trying new restaurants. I'm not a big fan of oldies music, but I do like to listen to some classic rock.
That's cool. I'm not a big fan of classic rock, but I do like to listen to some country music.
I like country music too. I'm not a big fan of rap or pop music, but I do like some indie music.
That's cool. I don't listen to much rap or pop music either. I'm not a big fan of indie music, but I do like some alternative rock.
I like alternative rock too. I think we have a lot in common.
I think so too. We should get together sometime and play racquetball.
That sounds like fun. I'll bring my racket.
